description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Starship Troopers: Extermination, including the film’s iconic Morita MK1 assault rifle, the E-Pulse firearms, and the Morita Hawkeye.
title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Starship Troopers: Extermination’s Guns
